name: Sushi Set
description: A Japanese dish of prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, accompanying a variety of ingredients, such as seafood (often raw) and vegetables.

name: Bimbimbap
description: A Korean mixed rice dish topped with assorted vegetables, a fried egg, and gochujang sauce.

name: Chicken Khao Soi
description: A Northern Thai dish featuring egg noodles in a rich and creamy coconut curry broth, topped with crispy fried noodles and served with pickled mustard greens, shallots, and lime.

name: Beef Pho
description: A Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and beef, served with fresh lime, and bean sprouts.
